sentences.en: Feed plants and they grow, neglect them and they suffer.
sentences.cn: 人勤地生宝；人懒地长草。

sentences.en: Feed plants to encourage steady growth.
sentences.cn: 给植物施肥促使其不断生长。

sentences.en: Feed the tomatoes once a week.
sentences.cn: 每周给番茄施一次肥。

sentences.en: Frogs generally feed at night.
sentences.cn: 青蛙一般在夜间进食。

sentences.en: Have you fed the cat?
sentences.cn: 你喂猫了吗？

sentences.en: He began to feed in the spaghetti, carefully separating the strands.
sentences.cn: 他开始放入意大利面，小心翼翼地将面一缕缕分开。

sentences.en: He needed money to feed his addiction to gambling.
sentences.cn: 他需要钱来满足他的赌瘾。

sentences.en: I have to feed the chickens and hoe the potatoes.
sentences.cn: 我得喂鸡，还得为马铃薯锄草。

sentences.en: Let your baby feed as long as she wants.
sentences.cn: 让小宝宝想吃就吃。

sentences.en: Lithuania produces more than enough food to feed itself.
sentences.cn: 立陶宛的粮食生产供大于求。

sentences.en: She criticizes me for the way I feed or change him.
sentences.cn: 她批评我不会给他喂奶、不会换尿布。

sentences.en: She is reduced to stealing to feed her hungry family.
sentences.cn: 她沦落到要靠偷窃来养活饥饿的家人。

sentences.en: She is too thin. Feed her up a bit.
sentences.cn: 她太瘦了，把她养胖点。

sentences.en: Slugs and snails feed at night.
sentences.cn: 蛞蝓和蜗牛夜间进食。

sentences.en: Slugs feed on decaying plant and animal material.
sentences.cn: 蛞蝓以腐烂的动植物为食。

sentences.en: Some families don't have the resources to feed themselves properly.
sentences.cn: 有些家庭无力维持生活。

sentences.en: The caterpillars feed on a wide range of trees, shrubs and plants.
sentences.cn: 毛虫以各类树木、灌木和植物为食。

sentences.en: The dog is off its feed this week.
sentences.cn: 这个星期这只狗没有食欲

sentences.en: The hen may not be able to feed its young.
sentences.cn: 雌鸟可能无法给幼鸟喂食。

sentences.en: They feed mostly on decaying vegetable matter.
sentences.cn: 它们大多以腐烂的蔬菜为食。

sentences.en: To keep their bees from wandering, beekeepers feed them sugar solutions.
sentences.cn: 为了防止蜜蜂迷路，养蜂人给它们喝糖水。

sentences.en: We brought along pieces of old bread and fed the birds.
sentences.cn: 我们带了几片陈面包来喂鸟。

sentences.en: what the audience tells me feeds back into my work.
sentences.cn: 观众的意见反馈到我的工作中。

words.tran_cn: 供给饲料的；摄取食物的
支线；喂食器；奶瓶；饲养员；支流
[畜牧]饲料；饲养；（动物或婴儿的）一餐

phrases.tran_cn: 进刀机构，供给机构；推进机构
馈送率；加料速度；进给速率
浇注系统；供料系统；供给系统
加上（油、煤等）；以…为食；用…喂养；用…供应…

trans.tran_cn: （给婴儿）一次喂奶，饲料，丰盛一餐，进料（器），网络供给节目
饲养，养活，吃食，施肥，灌输，输送，供应，将…放到，满足，加深，信息输入计算机，喂球，向电视台传送…以供播出
trans.tran_en: to give a special substance to a plant, which helps it grow
if a baby or an animal feeds, they eat
to supply something, especially a liquid, gas, or electricity
